name: Perlin & Pinpin - Demo #1: Back to School
name_original: Perlin & Pinpin - Demo #1: Back to School
description:
WHAT'S THIS FIRST DEMO?

First demo takes place in a classroom. Next one will take place somewhere else.

You need to pass a randomly generated maths test in order to escape.

You may check things and talk to people in order to unlock an extra minigame.

Will you find it?

2n of August 2020 UPDATE!

  • Added the possibility to skip text if you don't want to read
  • Even if no bugs were reported, I updated some stuff in the background
  • Little pixel art changes
  • Slight difficulty increase
  • Updated Patreon supporters list on boot screen (BTW you can DL an early version of our next demo on Patreon)

WHO ARE WE?

We are a small indie game studio.

  • All our graphical design (incl. logo design, banner, etc.) and pixel art is being handled by our ❤ Gunpog.
  • Coding, Music, SFX, Website, Community Management and other stuff is being taken care of by someone else.

HOW TO SUPPORT US?

We do not ask people for anything, but are grateful for any form of support.

You may support us taking some of your time by: 

  • communicating about our ongoing development by talking to your friends and family,
  • posting about our work on your favorite forums and/or social medias,
  • forwarding, retweeting, liking our posts.

Alternatively, or on top of this, you may consider:

  • buying our merch on http://www.store.lizardrive.com,
  • becoming our supporter on http://www.patreon.com/lizardrive (we provide exclusive stuff to our supporters and credit them)
